summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue North from the south line of Coulter's Addition to East Thomas Street; 37th Avenue North, from East John Street to High Lane, East John Street, from 36th Avenue North to 37th Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle by laying sewers and water mains with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 32779 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
